title: Success and Happiness - Quotes to Motivate Inspire & Live by
description: This is the first book in the Success and Happiness series.Quotes aimed at building character, instilling ethical behavior and inspiring happiness through inner awareness. Quotes selected and arraigned for specific real life circumstances.
